metadata.title: PM Shehbaz expresses grief over tragic fire in Iraqâ€™s al-Kut, expresses solidarity

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday expressed deep sorrow over the devastating fire in Iraq's city of al-Kut, which claimed numerous lives and injured many others. In a message posted on his official X (formerly Twitter) account, the Prime Minister wrote: "Deeply saddened by the tragic fire in al-Kut, Iraq, that has caused tragic loss of lives of innocent people. My heartfelt condolences to the families who lost their loved ones in this tragedy. May the injured recover swiftly. Pakistan stands in solidarity with the people of Iraq in this hour of grief."
